summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 34th Avenue North, from East John Street to a connection with the existing watermain at the south line of Coulter's Addition; by constructing wateramins and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14846 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
